title: Factoring Rules
text: Remember the acronym, FOIL, which says to multiply the First, Outer, Inner, and Last terms to multiply the two expressions.
speech: Remember the acronym, FOIL, which says to multiply the First, Outer, Inner, and Last terms to multiply the two expressions.
pacedSpeech: Remember the acronym, FOIL, which says to multiply the First, Outer, Inner, and Last terms to multiply the two expressions.

title: First Terms
text: What will we get when we multiply our first terms?
speech: What will we get when we multiply our first terms?
pacedSpeech: What will we get when we multiply our first terms?

title: $$\frac{Inner}{Outer}$$ Terms
text: What will we get when we multiply our inner and outer terms?
speech: What will we get when we multiply our inner and outer terms?
pacedSpeech: What will we get when we multiply our inner and outer terms?

title: Last Terms
text: What will we get when we multiply our last terms?
speech: What will we get when we multiply our last terms?
pacedSpeech: What will we get when we multiply our last terms?

title: Solution
text: Combining our terms, what will our final expanded answer be?
speech: Combining our terms, what will our final expanded answer be?
pacedSpeech: Combining our terms, what will our final expanded answer be?
